name: vue-audit-table
description: A lightweight Vue 3 component for displaying audit trail differences between old and new values with a clean, color-coded table interface
author: Ivan Kelava[](https://github.com/ivan119)

scripts.release: npm run build && npm version patch -m "chore(release): %s" && git push --tags && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:minor: npm run build && npm version minor -m "chore(release): %s" && git push --tags && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:major: npm run build && npm version major -m "chore(release): %s" && git push --tags && npm publish --access public
